ch0202_00_dahlia/0101_0701_02_10:
No need to worry. ♪ Let’s have a joyful
day today!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7101_0701_01_10:
When I’m happy, I express it with my entire body
through song and dance!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7101_0701_02_10:
Even in moments of sadness, it brings a sense of
happiness to me!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7102_0701_01_10:
My partner is always having fun! Watching her
energizes me so much!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7102_0701_02_10:
She’s cheerful and bursting with energy, so it’s
no surprise she’s reeeally strong, too!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7102_0701_03_10:
What I’m trying to say is...always be smiling!
It works wonders!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7103_0701_01_10:
There are moments when even I start to
feel down.
ch0202_00_dahlia/7103_0701_02_10: But I try to keep my chin up, you know?
ch0202_00_dahlia/7103_0701_03_10:
There’s fun around every corner, so moping’s
just a waste of time!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7104_0701_01_10:
Even when something unlucky happens, changing
your mindset can bring about good fortune!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7104_0701_02_10:
As long as you believe in yourself and your
friends, I bet you can do the same!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7105_0701_01_10:
I feel lucky just knowing you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0202_00_dahlia/7105_0701_02_10:
There’s something so wonderful about meeting
new people and getting to know them!
ch0202_00_dahlia/7105_0701_03_10:
No need to worry. ♪ Every day is full
of excitement!
ch0202_00_dahlia/1701_0701_01_10: I have a lucky present for you!
ch0202_00_dahlia/1701_0702_01_10: If you keep smiling, you’ll be even more lucky!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2501_0701_01_10:
Have you ever wondered whether you’re lucky
or unlucky?
ch0202_00_dahlia/2501_0701_02_10: Let’s battle someday at the Battle Arcade!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2501_0701_03_10: It’ll be interesting to see the results!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2501_0702_01_10:
Your bond is so strong that maybe luck—whether
good or bad—doesn’t really matter for you!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2501_0702_02_10:
The key is to keep being yourself, no matter
what fortune befalls you!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2511_0701_01_10:
No need to worry. ♪ Battling with you is so
much fun!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve seen a lot of different battles, but yours are
really unpredictable!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2511_0701_03_10:
Watching you battle is like playing a game at an
arcade—I never get bored!
ch0202_00_dahlia/2511_0702_01_10:
The more unpredictable things are, the more
interesting they get!
ch0202_00_dahlia/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s start the morning with an energetic greeting!
It’ll bring good luck!
ch0202_00_dahlia/3003_0701_01_10:
You need to take a break when you’re tired.
If you keep pushing yourself, you might bring
about bad luck!
ch0202_00_dahlia/3005_0701_01_10:
Well done working so late! Hard work every day
will bring happiness your way!
